answerText: weak force[10] Along with the W-plus and W-minus boson, this other particle carries the weak force. This neutral spin-one particle decays into a fermion and its antiparticle.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 7 | 5 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Fermi developed an early theory of this interaction which was modified by Gamow and Teller to include parity violation, though the cross-section grows too quickly with the energy to be correct. For 10 points each: [10] Name this fundamental force that mediates beta-decay. Glashow, Weinberg, and Salam managed to combine it with the electromagnetic force, and it is uniquely able to change quark flavors.
